Gifts are allowed through the checkpoint.
We just ask that you refrain from wrapping them...
If there is something in your gift that needs to be inspected,...
...and this can slow down the line.
Toy weapons and replicas are not permitted in your carry-on bags.
They can, however, be packed in checked luggage.
Small gaming consoles, small toys, things of that sort,...
...they can be placed in your carry-on bag.
If you do have large electronics, game consoles,...
...they need to be placed in a separate bin for screening.
